QuestData.Title: Stormstout's Hops
QuestData.Description: All three farmers have delivered their hops to Halfhill. Perhaps you should check in with Chen to make sure that he received them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Chen Stormstout in Halfhill.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Chen Stormstout at Halfhill in the Valley of the Four Winds.
QuestData.RewardText: Look at all these hops! This is quality stuff, too.$b$bWe're making headway, $n. Soon we'll have all the ingredients to finally start brewing.
